documentation.description: Gets configuration and usage information about datafeeds.

datafeed_id.description: The ID of the datafeeds stats to fetch

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no datafeeds. (This includes `_all` string or when no datafeeds have been specified)

format.description: a short version of the Accept header, e.g. json, yaml

h.description: Comma-separated list of column names to display

s.description: Comma-separated list of column names or column aliases to sort by

time.description: The unit in which to display time values
